Room.Name: Islandia Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Islandia Drive, between the Veteran's Library and the Aquarium.
Room.LongDescription: The Bendine Aquarium and Marina is a very large facility, connected to the Adlermann Center of Marine Research and Oceanography. Bordering the facility is the Bendine Bay, a closed off section of the Bay where a number of monsterous creatures are kept for study and to perform for children.
